unnormalised: Hey folks, solar rooftop subsidies are a game changer! Imagine saving serious Rs. on electricity bills, especially with Mumbai's crazy summers. My cousin, Priya, in Kerala got it done just before Onam and she's thrilled. Heard MNRE is pushing these. It's a win-win! Reduced pollution + cheaper electricity. Chalo, let's all go solar! Even better than biryani on a Sunday afternoon, eh? Think of the planet, ya!
